meanings.sent1: She felt unaroused during the boring movie.
meanings.sent2: The unaroused cat lazily napped in the sun.
meanings.sent3: The unaroused puppy showed no interest in playing fetch.
meanings.sent4: The unaroused garden remained untouched and unexplored.
meanings.sent5: His unaroused demeanor made it clear he was not in the mood for romance.

meanings.sent1: The unaroused student struggled to focus in class.
meanings.sent2: The unaroused crowd listened passively to the speech.
meanings.sent3: The unaroused plant wilted from lack of attention.
meanings.sent4: Her unaroused mind wandered aimlessly in boredom.
meanings.sent5: The unaroused atmosphere in the room made it hard to stay awake.
